modShortDescription: Underwhelmed by the vanilla Auto Trigger Gun Mod? This 7DTD mod modifies Automatic Trigger Gun modification to increase rounds per minute by 75%.
modDescription:
Underwhelmed by the vanilla Auto Trigger Gun Mod? It seemed lacking so Laz Man decided to mod it so it also increases the rounds per minute of the [gun](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) it is attached to.

## Features

* Initial Release (7DTD Alpha 18.2 Tested)
* Modifies Automatic Trigger Gun modification to increase rounds per minute by 75%.
* Replaces Marksman Rifle gunfire sound with the one used for the AK47 (original sound doesnâ€™t work well for automatic fire)

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tOKMus1lpcNga3sYfi0fp3lDngWplKO2/view)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17240-laz-mans-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Laz Man](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/laz-man/)
